# Getting Setup with R and RStudio {#getting-setup}

  - Downloading R & RStudio 
  - Reference R4DS & other R tutorials 
  - Installing packages 
  - Extracting/loading data we prepare

First, you will need to download R and RStudio. 

You can download R from https://www.r-project.org/. 

You can download RStudio from https://www.rstudio.com/. 

You may want to familiarize yourself with common R and RStudio references 
like the *R for Data Science* book, available free and online here: 
https://r4ds.had.co.nz/.
